pyqgis_plugin.name: SHED
pyqgis_plugin.description: A tool to connect to various open data platforms to obtain data and postprocess it with various hydrological tools. Requires a (free) account at Copernicus Data Space platform.
pyqgis_plugin.about: A tool to connect to various open data platforms to obtain data and postprocess it with various hydrological tools. Requires a (free) account at Copernicus Data Space platform.
